display.title: Hyperspeed Lane
description: &&3Blue Ice&&r is an unmeltable variant of &&3Ice&&r that allows boats to &&dmove at ludicrous speeds&&r on its surface. They can be crafted using 81 &&3Ice Blocks&&r, or found in the world.
Ice can be &&3farmed&&r &&7(See Farming: Variety Fair)&&r, or you can collect &&3packed and blue ice&&r from &&2Icebergs&&r or &&2Frozen Peaks&&r.
&&7[Cardinal Ice Boats]&&r you can use the &&7[&&r&&6Arrow Keys&&r&&7]&&r to make or buffer &&d90 degree turns&&r on ice lanes.
